snippet: The first of the “Outlander” series, published decades ago, has hit No. 1 on best-seller lists now that it has been turned into a TV series.
abstract: Diana Gabaldon’s Outlander series has become more popular than ever thanks to Starz television series based on the books; first of eight novels reached top of best-seller list for first time, 23 years after publication, and Gabaldon has signed deal for ninth novel.
lead_paragraph: The first of the “Outlander” series, published decades ago, has hit No. 1 on best-seller lists now that it has been turned into a TV series.

headline.seo: TV’s ‘Outlander’ Puts Diana Gabaldon’s Novel on Top Again
headline.main: A Best Seller Again, After a Boost From TV
headline.print_headline: A Best Seller Again, After a Boost From TV
